response.original_title: TỔ QUỐC TRONG TIM: THE CONCERT FILM 2025
response.overview: Following the brilliant success of the National Concert – Homeland In My Heart held on August 10th at My Dinh National Stadium, along with the anticipation and requests from the large public, Nhan Dan Newspaper decided to bring Homeland In My Heart: The Concert Film. This film not only recreates a historical cultural and artistic event but is also a way to deeply spread love for the Fatherland and national pride.
response.title: TỔ QUỐC TRONG TIM: THE CONCERT FILM 2025
